mapper.select: SELECT job_posting_board_id, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(job_posting_board_place,',',1),',',-1) AS zonecode, SUBSTRING_INDEX(SUBSTRING_INDEX(job_posting_board_place,',',2),',',-1) AS road_jibunAddr FROM job_posting_board WHERE job_posting_board_id =#{jobPostingBoardId}

SELECT jpb.job_posting_board_id, jpb.company_id, jpb.job_posting_board_category_id, jpb.job_posting_board_career_id, jpb.job_posting_board_title , jpb.job_posting_board_deadline, c.category_frontend, c.category_backend, c.category_devops, cr.one_year_less, cr.two_year_over, cr.three_year_over, cr.five_year_over FROM job_posting_board jpb LEFT OUTER JOIN category c ON jpb.job_posting_board_category_id = c.category_id LEFT OUTER JOIN career cr ON jpb.job_posting_board_career_id = cr.career_id WHERE jpb.company_id = #{companyId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO job_posting_board ( company_id, job_posting_board_category_id, job_posting_board_career_id, job_posting_board_title, job_posting_salary, job_posting_board_place, job_posting_board_content, job_posting_board_deadline, created_at ) VALUE( #{companyId}, #{jobPostingBoardCategoryId}, #{jobPostingBoardCareerId}, #{jobPostingBoardTitle}, #{jobPostingBoardSalary}, #{jobPostingBoardPlace}, #{jobPostingBoardContent}, #{jobPostingBoardDeadline}, #{createdAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT jpb.job_posting_board_id, jpb.job_posting_board_title, jpb.job_posting_board_content, cd.company_id, cd.company_detail_id, cd.company_picture, cd.company_address, cd.company_phone_number, cd.company_email FROM job_posting_board jpb INNER JOIN company_detail cd ON jpb.company_id = cd.company_id WHERE job_posting_board_id = #{jobPostingBoardId}
SELECT * FROM job_posting_board ORDER BY job_posting_board_id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT job_posting_board_id, job_posting_board_title, job_posting_board_deadline FROM job_posting_board WHERE job_posting_board_title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY job_posting_board_id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
